# uptimekuma_notification_pagerduty (Data Source)

Get PagerDuty notification information by ID or name

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "uptimekuma_notification_pagerduty" "example" {
  name = "Production Alerts"
}

# Or retrieve by ID
data "uptimekuma_notification_pagerduty" "by_id" {
  id = 1
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `id` (Number) Notification identifier
- `name` (String) Notification name
